The word that weâ€™ve heard a million times now. And because of this word, other words have come up:
 "hungry" 
 "in need" 
 And many others.
Let\'s reduce the amount of people who will use these words by donating to those who need it.
And let\'s not be afraid to ask for help when we need it.
Our app is designed to connect donors and donees all over South Africa in one common place. \n\n Donees request for the items they need, and donors donate items to the donees who request them.
Help us in our cause by creating an account to request or donate. \n\n It\'s that simple!
